{{cpp/string/char_traits/title|assign}}
{{cpp/string/char_traits/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|notes={{mark noexcept since c++11}}&lt;br&gt;{{mark constexpr since c++17}}|
static void assign( char_type&amp; c1, const char_type&amp; c2 );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|notes={{mark constexpr since c++20}}|
static char_type* assign( char_type* ptr, std::size_t count, char_type c2 );
}}
{{dcl end}}

@1@ Assigns {{c|c2}} to {{c|c1}}, behaves identically to {{c|1=c1 = c2}}.
@2@ Assigns {{c|c2}} to each character in {{c|count}} characters in the character sequence pointed to by {{c|ptr}}.

See {{named req|CharTraits}} for the general requirements on character traits for {{tt|X::assign}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|c1|character to assign to}}
{{par|c2|character value to assign}}
{{par|ptr|pointer to a character sequence to assign to}}
{{par|count|the length of the character sequence}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ (none)
@2@ {{c|ptr}}

===Complexity===
@1@ Constant.
@2@ Linear in {{c|count}}.
